name: Radial Bolt Array
description: Evenly distributed lightning bolts arranged radially around a center point
useCase: Portal effects, energy sources, electric wheels - any centered radial effect
visualCharacteristics: Clean radial symmetry, no overlaps, even distribution
performanceNotes: O(n) with boltCount, very efficient. Can batch all bolts into single path for better performance.
implementationNotes: Use even numbers for boltCount (8, 12, 16) for balanced appearance
angleOffset allows rotation of entire pattern
centerRadius should be inner glow radius to avoid gap
